sen.j: 加悦SL広場（かやえすえるひろば）とは京都府与謝野町加悦にあるカヤ興産が運営する鉄道保存展示施設である。
sen.e: Located in Yosano Cho, Yosa Gun, Kyoto Prefecture, Kaya Steam Locomotive Square is a facility run by Kaya Kosan Co. Ltd. to preserve and exhibit railway cars.
Located in Yosano Cho, Yosa Gun, Kyoto Prefecture, Kaya Steam Locomotive Square is a facility run by Kaya Kosan Co. Ltd. to preserve and exhibit railway cars.
Located in Kaya, Yosano-cho, Kyoto Prefecture, Kaya Steam Locomotive Square is a facility run by Kaya Kosan Co. Ltd. to preserve and exhibit railway cars.
sen.cmt: 合併により、現在の住所表記が異なりますが、指示書に従い、原文通り訳出しました。

sen.j: 1977年9月に開設した、主に加悦鉄道で活躍した車両を展示している。
sen.e: It opened in September 1977 to exhibit mainly rail cars that were used by Kaya Railway.
It opened in September 1977 to exhibit mainly rail cars that were used by the Kaya Railway.
It opened in September 1977 to exhibit mainly rail cars that were used by the Kaya Railway.

sen.j: なお以前は加悦駅跡にあったが、1993年に当時の加悦町へ加悦駅用地を譲渡することになったため、1996年11月に現在の大江山鉱山駅跡に移転・再開している。
sen.e: It had been located in the place where Kaya Station used to stand, but since the company decided to sell its site of the station to former Kaya Cho in 1993, it moved the facility to the site where Oe Yama Mine Station used to be, and resumed its business.
sen.cmt: 大江山鉱山駅→Oe Yama Mine Station（大江山鉱山駅）[定訳不明]
sen.e: It had been located in the place where Kaya Station used to stand, but since the company decided to sell its station site to former Kaya Cho in 1993, it moved the facility to the site where Oe Yama Mine Station used to be, and resumed its business.

It had been located in the place where Kaya Station used to stand, but since the company decided to sell its station site to former Kaya-cho in 1993, it moved the facility to the site where Oe Yama Kozan Station used to be, and resumed its business in November, 1996.
